Class FlipAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Animation
      • noisyninja.com.marvelcharacterlibrary.components.FlipAnimation

  • public class FlipAnimation
extends Animation
    Animation class, accepts two views, flips first view and shows the opposite view Created by ir2pi on 12/29/2014.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlipAnimation(View fromView, View toView)
      Creates a 3D flip animation between two views.
